annonstext:
You will find the best hospitals in Sweden in Region Jönköpings Län!

Höglandssjukhuset in Eksjö was placed 4th in 2019 regards to the best middle-sized hospitals in Sweden. 

Why should you choose the Department of Internal Medicin and Geriatric Care in Eksjö as your next place to work? There are several reasons, but the main reason is the pleasant atmosphere. We like it here! We help each other, you are free to speak your mind, and we enjoy being at work with our colleagues! We offer you an employment with opportunities to take part in the development of the clinic. There is a great spirit to educate which has put us in top-positions amongst interns ranking list in Sweden several times.

We want you!

Are you a licensed doctor with specialist expertise looking to take the next step in your medical career? Would you like to work at one of the top 5 medium sized hospitals in Sweden? Then you have come to the right place! 

You are a medical doctor with a specialty within the area of neurology. If also specialist within internal medicine it is meritorious. It is desirably with working experience within the neurology speciality.

The department of Internal Medicin and Geriatric Care is a developing clinic where we nurse patients who are in need of specialized internal medicine and geriatric rehabilitation. The clinic has a history of innovative, systematic and evidence-based quality management with the patient in focus. The clinic is ISO-certified according to ISO 9001:2015 since 2014.

Our offer﻿

As a specialist doctor at the Department of Internal Medicin and Geriatric Care you will be working at the inward with both stroke-patients and other neurology diseases. You will also take part at the reception for outdoor-patients which covers all sorts of diseases. As a specialist doctor you are a front person who stand for good approach and good collaboration as well as in the clinic as in between the clinics at the hospital. If you have the interest of tutoring students there will be opportunities for that.

What else about Eksjö?

 Eksjö is also being called ”the unic wooden town” and is located at the highland of Småland. Here it is close to the nature with great running tracks and ski trails around the corner. The nature is wonderful and filled with various experiences for everyone. It is a great town with good schools for children of all ages and also a gymnasium for the elder ones. All with good reputation due to good results in education.

Why should you choose Region of Jönköpings County?

We are the county that takes care of you on your journey to Sweden. Our goal is to make sure that you feel confident in your decision to join us here at one of our fine hospitals. Our relocation program will make sure that you will have a smooth and pleasant experience and make sure that you always have someone to turn to. If you are one of the chosen candidates we will set up a skype interview followed by a face-to-face interview and visit to our hospital, given that the Skype-meeting turned out successfully.

Relocation services

·        Learning Swedish

·        Applying for your Swedish medical license

·        Finding accommodation

·        Relocation

·        Applying for childcare

·        Contact with Swedish government agencies

·        Supporting family members who are moving with you

We will be with you every step of the way in the process and other practical matters in order for you to have the best chances possible to have a great medical career with us.

Questions and applications

If you have any questions about the clinical work, please get in touch with Pierre Cherfan, Clinic Operations Director at  EMAIL . If you have any questions about the process or our offer, please contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Recruitment specialist, at  EMAIL 

We are looking forward to have your application no later than April 16 2021.
